# kiss_repository

> Lightweight generic repository pattern for Dart following KISS principles - unified interface for data access operations with easy backend switching

kiss_repository provides a consistent API for CRUD operations, streaming, and batch processing across different storage implementations (in-memory, file-based, Firebase, PocketBase, DynamoDB, Drift).

## Core Interface

- [Repository<T>](lib/src/repository.dart): Abstract base class defining CRUD, streaming, and batch operations
- [IdentifiedObject<T>](lib/src/repository.dart): Wrapper pairing objects with unique string IDs
- [Query](lib/src/repository.dart): Base class for custom queries - extend to create domain-specific filters
- [QueryBuilder<T>](lib/src/repository.dart): Translates generic queries to implementation-specific queries
- [RepositoryException](lib/src/repository.dart): Typed exceptions with notFound, alreadyExists, unknown codes

## Reference Implementations

- [InMemoryRepository](lib/src/in_memory_repository.dart): In-memory storage for testing and temporary data
- [JsonFileRepository](lib/src/json_file_repository.dart): JSON file persistence for integration testing
